column4: Mekyerɛ hɔn a hɔn akoma mu tsew."

column3: nkyɛ m’anan reyɛ aman; M’anamɔn reyɛ apatser."
Aber a muhun ndzebɔnyɛfo eyiedzi no."

column2: "Na owungyam bi nnyi hɔn wu mu: Na mbom hɔn ahoɔdzen wɔ hɔ pintsinn."
"Wonnyi fona mu dɛ nyimpa binom; Nkyii so wonnguan hɔn do dɛ nyimpa binom."
"Dɛm ntsi ntsɛn tse dɛ ntweaban brabra hɔn kɔn ho; Akatabansɛm kata hɔn ho dɛ atar."
"Seradze ama hɔn enyiwa apopɔr: Hɔn akoma mu adwendwen bu do."

column3: na ndzebɔnyɛ mu wɔka nhyɛdosɛm: Wɔka ekromponsɛm."
Na hɔn gyirama nenam asaase do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na no nkorɔfo san ba ha: Na wɔsɔn nsu a ofi kɔɔpow a ayɛ ma mu."

column3: Nyankopɔn si dɛn hu? Ana nyimdzee bi wɔ Ɔsorsornyi no mu?"
woyinom nye nyimpa bɔn no; Na hɔn ho dwe hɔn daa ntsi
Na mahohor me nsa ho wɔ abemdzi mu kwa;"

column2: "Aber a modween mbrɛ mebɛyɛ ehu yi no
"Kodur dɛ mokɔr Nyankopɔn n’ahotseweebea no mu hɔ
column3: Na mukohun mbrɛ hɔn ewiei rukowie."
edze hɔn esisi beebi mbrɛ ɔyɛ tor: Na ɔwo dze hɔn hwe famu ma wɔsɛɛ."

column2: "Mbrɛ woedua adan amamfo awerɛfir mu a! Hu ama wɔasa koraa."
"Dɛ daa a wɔaso enyan; Dɛmara so na ɔwo

column3: Na me nsɛbɛ mu wowɔɔ me:"

column2: "Meyɛɛ dɛ ɔkwasea a minnyim dze; Meyɛɛ dɛ abowa wɔ w’enyim."
"Naaso mowɔ wo nkyɛn daa: Ɔwo na esuo me nsa enyimfa mu."

column3: Na n’ekyir no agye me akɔ enyimnyam mu."

column2: "Woana na mowɔ no wɔ sor ka wo ho? Na obi nnyi asaase do a morohwehwɛ no ka wo ho."
"Mo honam na m’akoma repa: Na Nyankopɔn nye m’akoma n’ahoɔdzen na me kyɛpɛn daa."

column3: hɔn a wɔnye wo ntamu twe no wɔbɛsɛɛ: Ɔwo asɛɛ hɔn a wofi wo nkyɛn kɔgor ndwamangor nyinara."
oye ma me dɛ motwe pin Nyankopɔn: Medze EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ayɛ mo guandɔbea
